statements: UPDATE products SET product_price = 50.25, product_quantity = 10 WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE products SET product_quantity = 20, product_price = 45.75 WHERE product_id = '99999999-9999-9999-9999-999999999999';

UPDATE products SET product_quantity = 10, product_price = 19.99, product_name = 'Updated Product Name' WHERE product_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE products SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET total_price = 100.50, quantity_sold = 5 WHERE sale_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 3, total_price = total_price + 35.75 WHERE sale_id = 10;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET total_amount = 1500.50, sale_quantity = 10 WHERE sale_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET unit_price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE Products SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_name = 'Shoes';
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 1, total_price = total_price + 15.50 WHERE sale_id = 201
UPDATE inventory SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE sales SET total_price = total_price + 50.25, quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 5 WHERE sale_id = 201
